title: The Dictator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may Oppress the town. One use.
- During the day, you may reveal yourself as The Dictator, gaining hang immunity for that day. Regain a charge of Oppress if it's already been used.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Appears innocent
- When the town is Oppressed, everyone is informed, and the following day phase is skipped.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

desc:
Post 4908
*The government doesn't watch people. People watch people.*
- The Personification of Authoritarianism
